text:
An error occurs if I set up the isapi_redirect.dll file
with Tomcat using the default workers.properties.  If
I comment out references to ajp13 in workers.properties
everything is happy.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
Works OK in the release version.  Probably got fixed and the bug report wasn't 
closed.
